item.title: “You should try driving, mate”: Lando Norris gets defensive against Ted Kravitz
item.description: “You should try driving, mate”: Lando Norris gets defensive against Ted Kravitz Amidst his controversy with Red Bull and Max Verstappen, Ted Kravitz has gained immense spotlight over the last weekend.
